h1 a charming journey of three friends packed with adventure h1  youll never be left wanting with this rpg combat that expands upon paper marios formula with a squad of 3 party members all fleshed out with their own strengths and weakness a story that is rich with character development the soundtrack is chockfull of earworms secrets everywhere you turn you can tell the devs truly love their craft as you play
